com.viaoa.hub
Class HubCSDelegate

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.hub.HubCSDelegate

public class HubCSDelegate
extends java.lang.Object

Delegate that manages client/server functionality, so that the same hub in other systems is in-sync.

Author:
vvia
